author: bridge-bot
content:
<trent_vanepps> > <trent_vanepps>  checking in again on "3. Lets try and find someone to take the lead on "Anaysis of trusted setup attack vectors" as their full time focus"

how strongly should we be pursuing this (is it a nice to have or very important)? would it need to be done before the ceremony itself starts?

if it's very important, the lead time to surface and hire someone means we'd need to start this process now, and i don't have the experience to evaluate/ hire someone with this background. and they'd likely end up on the PSE team anyways (re @Barrywhitehat: My takeaways are 

1. Lets schadual the audit with gorth16 power of tau as an indication of how much work it will be , but we have not decided to use that. 
2. Lets find a way to review Kev's (https://hackmd.io/@6iQDuIePQjyYBqDChYw_jg/Bk6sERCH9) proposal and see if that is better for our needs rather than the groth16 based one 
3. Lets try and find someone to take the lead on "Anaysis of trusted setup attack vectors" as their full time focus)
